select a.notice_id,b.type_name,a.notice_name,a.notice_content,date(a.notice_time) as notice_time from t_notice_main a left join t_notice_type b on a.type_id=b.type_id where a.type_id=#{typeId} and a.notice_state is null
and a.notice_name like '%' #{noticeName} '%'
order by a.notice_time desc
select file_link from t_notice_file where notice_id=#{noticeId} order by file_time limit 1
select a.notice_id,b.type_name,a.notice_name,a.notice_content,a.notice_time from t_notice_main a left join t_notice_type b on a.type_id=b.type_id where a.type_id=#{typeId} and a.notice_id=#{noticeId}
select file_id,file_link from t_notice_file where notice_id=#{noticeId}
select info_id,info_content,info_tel,info_mail,info_qrcode,info_logo,info_pic from t_info_main order by info_time desc limit 1
